creator: wburrows@e2open.com
text:
- lock owner not being read out of response from server because owner 
value was "escaped" using CDATA decl. DOMUtils was only looking for text 
responses.

creator: ib@fiz-chemie.de
text:
Patch applied to HEAD and 2.1 branch. The patch is perfectly reasonable since
there may be more servers that return certain property values in CDATA sections.
